ing: 1 fluid ounce creme de cacao liqueur
des: "A great cocktail utilizing aquavit - Norway's national spirit. If you have never tried aquavit, then this is a great drink to try it in."
ins: In a cocktail mixer full of ice, combine aquavit, creme de cacao and lime juice. Shake vigorously for 5 to 7 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.
